content.prompt: Based on the passage, the author would most likely support which of the following policies?

choices.label: Adopting a socialist system of government to reduce economic inequalities in Japanese society
Providing greater educational opportunities to increase women’s economic independence
Industrializing the Japanese economy to increase the standard of living for all Japanese citizens
Returning Japan’s political order to the way it was under the Tokugawa Shogunate

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
